alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 9:51AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL MOVE ACROSS THE WESTERN SOUTHERN TIER LATE THIS MORNING... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 950 AM EDT, a band of heavy snow was across northern portions of Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties moving south at 10 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Jamestown, Olean, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda, Falconer, Ashford, Allegany, Franklinville, Mayville, Clymer, Cuba, Jamestown West, SUNY Fredonia, Weston Mills and St. Bonaventure. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 59. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 29. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
